oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Exposure and destruction of Elymus repens rhizomes and Rumex crispus rootstocks
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Melander, Bo
Nørremark, Michael
Fløjgaard, Erik
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper summaries the latest achievements with the development of new technologies for uprooting and destroying vegetative propagules of Elytrigia repens and Rumex crispus
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Melander, Bo; Nørremark, Michael and Fløjgaard, Erik (2008) Exposure and destruction of Elymus repens rhizomes and Rumex crispus rootstocks. In: Perennial Weeds - A growing problem, EWRS, Wageningen, p. 8.
